mapper.select: select * from notepad.note where user_id = #{user_id} and delete_time is null and note_title like concat('%',#{thing},'%') or note_content like concat('%',#{thing},'%') or note_date like concat('%',#{thing},'%') order by top_time desc,note_date desc;
mapper.insert: insert into notepad.note(user_id, note_title, note_pic, note_content, note_date, note_class_id, top_time, note_collect, delete_time) values (#{user_id},#{note_title},#{note_pic},#{note_content},#{note_date},#{note_class_id},#{top_time},#{note_collect},#{delete_time})
